name: Soccer Life Story
description:
[Xbox (or Xinput) gamepad required]
Take care of yourself, Tryouts are soon! This is a life sim soccer game with unique analog controls. Spend your time keeping up with schoolwork, talking to friends and of course, trainign your soccer skills in time for tryouts this friday!

Game art and sound made in 48 Hours for Ludum Dare 46 by @_jrap
Because of this, you may notice some, unfinished elements hehe.

[Requires windows and an xbox (xinput) controller] Includes a brief tutorial but for your reference:

Left stick - Move

Right Stick - Aim shots

Right Trigger - Kick

A - Interact / Talk

Y - Stop interacting / Check stats
